question_text: Which of the following security concerns are associated with NFC? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Relay attacks where attackers mimic a trusted device
Eavesdropping due to short-range RF leakage
Malware injection via NFC tag triggers
Unauthorized NFC session hijacking from 10 meters away
correct_answer: Relay attacks where attackers mimic a trusted device
Eavesdropping due to short-range RF leakage
Malware injection via NFC tag triggers
explanation: While short-range limits exposure, NFC is still vulnerable to relay attacks, close-proximity sniffing, and malicious tag triggers. Hijacking from 10 meters is not feasible due to physical range limits.
